column4: Help! I just finished the updates I think for the generic kernel and now I'm in low graphics mode and I can't see anything on my monitor. Luckily I am in via VNC but everything is soooo small. How can I undo this update? I hope I can read your responses :(
the update has screwed up my video somehow, what does it matter why? can someone tell me how to undo the updates?
how did you install your graphics card drivers?
ok, boot into safe mode, and do the "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg"
